name: NAMES_STATIC
description: The table holds extracted data from the Non-Patient Person Name (EAM) master file. These records store name information (first/last, academic suffix, etc) for static master files referencing people (User (EMP), Provider (SER), and so forth).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the name record.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: Internationally formatted non-patient name of the person.

columns.name: LAST_NAME_SPOUSE
columns.description: Stores the part of the person's last name from their spouse.

columns.name: LAST_NAME_PREFIX
columns.description: Stores the person's last name prefix.

columns.name: PREFERRED_NAME
columns.description: Stores the name the person prefers to be called.

columns.name: GIVEN_NAME_INITIALS
columns.description: Stores the initials for the person's given name.
